pullrequest.title: Add random walk params to noise for sdf 1.6

content.raw:
I believe an alternative form of most of these changes has been made in pull request #525 with the following differences:

* the `density` parameter (alternative to `stddev`) was not added
* `min="0.0"` was not added to the `precision` parameter
* the `dynamic_bias_stddev` parameter was added instead of `walk_density`
* the `dynamic_bias_correlation_time` parameter  was added instead of `walke_correlation_time`
* the `dynamic_bias_correlation_time` does not have `min="0.0"`
content.html:
I believe an alternative form of most of these changes has been made in pull request #525 with the following differences:

  • the density parameter (alternative to stddev) was not added
  • min="0.0" was not added to the precision parameter
  • the dynamic_bias_stddev parameter was added instead of walk_density
  • the dynamic_bias_correlation_time parameter was added instead of walke_correlation_time
  • the dynamic_bias_correlation_time does not have min="0.0"
